definition: to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: In the absence of your judgment, everything would be fine.
sentences.chinese: 停止你的主觀臆斷，一切都會很好。

sentences.english: I am sorry if you have misunderstood my message by subjective interpretation.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉地說，您主觀臆斷，曲解了我文章的原意。

sentences.english: Never assume, for it makes an ASS out of U and ME. (Anon)
sentences.chinese: 永遠不要主觀臆斷，因爲那會使你我成爲蠢驢。

sentences.english: The whole plan is based on merely his own supposition.
sentences.chinese: 整個計劃只是建立在他的主觀臆斷上。

sentences.english: The assumption of free will is strongest in this category.
sentences.chinese: 在這種類型裏，對於自由意志的臆斷是最強烈的。

sentences.english: Never assume, for it makes an ASS out of U and ME.
sentences.chinese: 永遠不要主觀臆斷，因爲那會使你我成爲蠢驢。

sentences.english: Any comparison that is not strictly factual runs the risk of being interpreted as subjective.
sentences.chinese: 任何不完全切合實際的比較都有可能被當作主觀臆斷。

sentences.english: Don't assume the mission is accomplished.
sentences.chinese: 不要主觀臆斷某項任務已經圓滿完成。

sentences.english: You should not rest your argument upon subjective and groundless conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 你不能以主觀臆斷作爲你的論據。

sentences.english: Doubt the existence of objective reality should insist, not subjective.
sentences.chinese: 疑義的存在應堅持客觀存在，不能主觀臆斷。

sentences.english: A case of small bowel volvulus was admitted with the clinical impression of acute occlusive intestinal ischemia.
sentences.chinese: 本病例入院臆斷爲阻塞性腸道缺血。

sentences.english: The reporting of such coincidental conditions can lead to undue fears and allegations.
sentences.chinese: 報告這些偶合病狀可能導致不適當的恐懼和主觀臆斷。
